docs.lead_paragraph: An experimental medical procedure, employed by surgeons to erase superficial wrinkles, is being used by non-medical practitioners in this country and abroad who are promoting the technique as "a miraculous discovery" that produces "baby fresh skin."

headline.main: The Perils of 'Face Peeling' -- Some Have Been Scarred for Life

docs.abstract: Face peeling, experimental med procedure used by surgeons to erase wrinkles, being promoted by nonprofessional practitioners; process involves burning off outer layer of skin with acid solution; cases of permanent scarring and 1 death due to process noted; asst FDA dir Gowdy says lack of regulatory legis impedes prosecution of face peel quacks; history and techniques described
docs.snippet: An experimental medical procedure, employed by surgeons to erase superficial wrinkles, is being used by non-medical practitioners in this country and abroad who are promoting the technique as "a miraculous discovery" that produces "baby fresh skin."
